data.client_settings: [BUILD INFO] Release Channel: stable, Build Number: 10906, Version Hash: 3c144be67111a692bdc6f459ab98e235b53699b6
data.expected_result: It should disconnect you like normal, and it SHOULDN'T crash your discord.
data.short_description: If you disconnect quick enough whilst on the RTC Connecting status on Discord's Voice Chat, your discord can crash.
data.steps_to_repro: - Connect to any voice chat you want. - When RTC Connecting shows, disconnect as soon as possible. - If you did it fast enough, discord should crash (or restart.)
